thread.title: Photos: Meet Former First Lady Nana Konadu Agyeman Rawlings
thread.title_full: Photos: Meet Former First Lady Nana Konadu Agyeman Rawlings

title: Photos: Meet Former First Lady Nana Konadu Agyeman Rawlings
text:
Source: Ghana | Myjoyonline.com Date: 21-10-2015 Time: 08:10:37:am 
Nana Konadu Agyeman Rawlings was born on November 17, 1948 and served as Ghanaâ€™s First Lady for close to two decades. 
Almost 67 years, Nana Konadu is beautiful and full of energy. Age has just not caught up with her yet. 
She was a guest on the Super Morning Show (SMS) on Joy FM with Nhyira Addo Tuesday and she came with her iconic exuberance and grace. 
See some photographs below:
